trans-unit.source: Describes a geometry using drawing commands.
trans-unit.target: 使用繪圖命令描述幾何。

trans-unit.source: This class is used with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> class to create a lightweight geometry that does not support data binding, animation, or modification.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 類別搭配使用，用以建立不支援資料繫結、動畫或修改的輕量幾何。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to add a segment without starting a figure by calling the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 未先呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> 方法以開始圖形，即嘗試新增區段。

trans-unit.source: The destination point for the end of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 弧形結尾的目的點。

trans-unit.source: The radii (half the width and half the height) of an oval whose perimeter is used to draw the angle.
trans-unit.target: 其圓周用來繪製角度之橢圓形的半徑 (寬度的一半和高度的一半)。

trans-unit.source: If the oval is very rounded in all directions, the arc will be rounded, if it is nearly flat, so will the arc. For example, a very large width and height would represent a very large oval, which would give a slight curvature for the angle.
trans-unit.target: 如果橢圓形的四週都是圓的，則弧形也會是圓的，而如果是幾近平面，則弧形也會幾近平面。例如，極大寬度和高度的值表示橢圓形會很大，這樣角度的曲率就會比較小。

trans-unit.source: The rotation angle of the oval that specifies the curve.
trans-unit.target: 指定曲線之橢圓形的旋轉角度。

trans-unit.source: The curvature of the arc can be rotated with this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 而弧形曲率可以利用這個參數進行旋轉。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw the arc greater than 180 degrees; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示繪製大於 180 度的弧度，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the arc is drawn in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise" /> direction.
trans-unit.target: 值，表示是以 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise" /> 方向繪製弧形。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the segment stroked when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> is used to render the segment; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 轉譯區段，將區段劃上底線時，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to treat the join between this segment and the previous segment as a corner when stroked with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 畫底線時，將這個區段和前一個區段之間的這個聯結視為邊角，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws an arc to the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 繪製弧形至指定的點。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上一個區段的結束點，做為起點。

trans-unit.source: If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A> method as its start point.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是在圖中的第一個區段，它會使用指定的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A>方法以做為其起始點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry> cannot be serialized if it contains a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry>如果它包含無法序列化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>或任何非圖案或區段遭拒。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to draw an arc using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.ArcTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何繪製弧線使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.ArcTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> where the figure begins.
trans-unit.target: 圖片開始的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the area contained by this figure for hit-testing, rendering, and clipping; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 使用這個圖形所包含的區域來進行點擊測試、呈現和裁剪；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to close the figure; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示關閉圖形；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, if two connecting lines are drawn, and <c>isClosed</c> is set to <see langword="false" />, the drawing will just be of two lines but if <c>isClosed</c> is set to <see langword="true" />, the two lines will be closed to create a triangle.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果繪製兩條連接的線條，而且 <c>isClosed</c> 設定為 <see langword="false" />，則繪圖只是兩條線；但是，如果 <c>isClosed</c> 設定為 <see langword="true" />，則會將兩條線封起來，以建立三角形。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the starting point for a new figure.
trans-unit.target: 指定新圖形的起點。

trans-unit.source: By calling this method multiple times, you can create multiple figures (self-contained geometric shapes) within this <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext>.
trans-unit.target: 多次呼叫這個方法，您可以建立多個圖表 （獨立幾何形狀），在這個<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry> cannot be serialized if it contains a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry>如果它包含無法序列化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>或任何非圖案或區段遭拒。

trans-unit.source: The first control point used to specify the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 用來指定曲線圖案的第一個控制點。

trans-unit.source: The second control point used to specify the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 用來指定曲線圖案的第二個控制點。

trans-unit.source: The destination point for the end of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線結尾的目的點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the segment stroked when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> is used to render the segment; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 轉譯區段，將區段劃上底線時，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to treat the join between this segment and the previous segment as a corner when stroked with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 畫底線時，將這個區段和前一個區段之間的這個聯結視為邊角，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws a Bezier curve to the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 繪製貝茲曲線至指定的點。

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, end point, and two control points.
trans-unit.target: 起點、 結束點，以及兩個控制點會定義三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The first control point determines the curvature of the first half of the segment, and the second control point determines the curvature of the second half of the segment.
trans-unit.target: 第一個控制點決定前半個區段，第二個控制點決定線段的第二個半。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上一個區段的結束點，做為起點。

trans-unit.source: If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A> method as its start point.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是在圖中的第一個區段，它會使用指定的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A>方法以做為其起始點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry> cannot be serialized if it contains a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry>如果它包含無法序列化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>或任何非圖案或區段遭拒。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to draw a Bezier curve using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BezierTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何繪製貝茲曲線使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BezierTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to add a segment without starting a figure by calling the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 未先呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> 方法以開始圖形，即嘗試新增區段。

trans-unit.source: Closes this context and flushes its content so that it can be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 關閉這個內容，並清除它的內容，以進行轉譯。

trans-unit.source: Once closed, the context cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 一旦關閉，無法修改內容。

trans-unit.source: The context must be closed before its content can be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 必須先關閉內容，可以轉譯其內容。

trans-unit.source: This context has already been closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: 這個內容 (Context) 已經關閉或已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The destination point for the end of the line.
trans-unit.target: 線條結尾的目的點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the segment stroked when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> is used to render the segment; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 轉譯區段，將區段劃上底線時，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to treat the join between this segment and the previous segment as a corner when stroked with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 畫底線時，將這個區段和前一個區段之間的這個聯結視為邊角，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws a straight line to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: 繪製直線至指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上一個區段的結束點，做為起點。

trans-unit.source: If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A> method as its start point.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是在圖中的第一個區段，它會使用指定的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A>方法以做為其起始點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry> cannot be serialized if it contains a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry>如果它包含無法序列化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>或任何非圖案或區段遭拒。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to draw a triangle using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.LineTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何繪製三角形使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.LineTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to add a segment without starting a figure by calling the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 未先呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> 方法以開始圖形，即嘗試新增區段。

trans-unit.source: The list of points that specify control points and destination points for one or more Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 點清單，指定一個或多個貝茲曲線的控制點和目的點。

trans-unit.source: The number of points in this list should be a multiple of three.
trans-unit.target: 而這個清單中的點數應該是 3 的倍數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the segment stroked when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> is used to render the segment; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 轉譯區段，將區段劃上底線時，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to treat the join between this segment and the previous segment as a corner when stroked with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 畫底線時，將這個區段和前一個區段之間的這個聯結視為邊角，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws one or more connected Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 繪製一個或多個連接的貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The first point in `points` specifies the first control point, the next specifies the second control point, the third point specifies the end point, the next point specifies the first control point of the next curve, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 中的第一個點`points`指定的第一個控制點，指定第二個控制點、 第三個點指定的結束點的下一個點指定的第一個控制點的下一個曲線，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上一個區段的結束點，做為起點。

trans-unit.source: If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A> method as its start point.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是在圖中的第一個區段，它會使用指定的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A>方法以做為其起始點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry> cannot be serialized if it contains a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry>如果它包含無法序列化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>或任何非圖案或區段遭拒。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to draw multiple connected Bezier curves using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.PolyBezierTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何畫連接使用的多個貝茲曲線<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.PolyBezierTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to add a segment without starting a figure by calling the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 未先呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> 方法以開始圖形，即嘗試新增區段。

trans-unit.source: The collection of points that specify destination points for one or more connected straight lines.
trans-unit.target: 點集合，指定一個或多個連接的貝茲曲線的目的點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the segment stroked when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> is used to render the segment; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 轉譯區段，將區段劃上底線時，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to treat the join between this segment and the previous segment as a corner when stroked with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 畫底線時，將這個區段和前一個區段之間的這個聯結視為邊角，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws one or more connected straight lines.
trans-unit.target: 繪製一個或多個連接的直線。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上一個區段的結束點，做為起點。

trans-unit.source: If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A> method as its start point.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是在圖中的第一個區段，它會使用指定的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A>方法以做為其起始點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry> cannot be serialized if it contains a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry>如果它包含無法序列化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>或任何非圖案或區段遭拒。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to draw a triangle using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.PolyLineTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何繪製三角形使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.PolyLineTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to add a segment without starting a figure by calling the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 未先呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> 方法以開始圖形，即嘗試新增區段。

trans-unit.source: The collection of points that specify control points and destination points for one or more quadratic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 點集合，指定一個或多個二次方貝茲曲線的控制點和目的點。

trans-unit.source: The first point in the list specifies the curve's control point, the next point specifies the destination point, the next point specifies the control point of the next curve, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 清單中的第一個點指定曲線的控制點、下一個點指定目的點、再下一個點指定下一個曲線的控制點，以此類推。

trans-unit.source: The list must contain an even number of points.
trans-unit.target: 清單必須包含偶數的點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the segment stroked when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> is used to render the segment; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 轉譯區段，將區段劃上底線時，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to treat the join between this segment and the previous segment as a corner when stroked with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 畫底線時，將這個區段和前一個區段之間的這個聯結視為邊角，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws one or more connected quadratic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 繪製一個或多個連接的二次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上一個區段的結束點，做為起點。

trans-unit.source: If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A> method as its start point.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是在圖中的第一個區段，它會使用指定的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A>方法以做為其起始點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry> cannot be serialized if it contains a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry>如果它包含無法序列化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>或任何非圖案或區段遭拒。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to draw multiple connected quadratic Bezier curves using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.PolyQuadraticBezierTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何繪製多個連接二次方貝茲曲線使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.PolyQuadraticBezierTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to add a segment without starting a figure by calling the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 未先呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> 方法以開始圖形，即嘗試新增區段。

trans-unit.source: The control point used to specify the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 用來指定曲線圖案的控制點。

trans-unit.source: The destination point for the end of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線結尾的目的點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the segment stroked when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> is used to render the segment; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 轉譯區段，將區段劃上底線時，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to treat the join between this segment and the previous segment as a corner when stroked with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 畫底線時，將這個區段和前一個區段之間的這個聯結視為邊角，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws a quadratic Bezier curve.
trans-unit.target: 繪製二次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a cubic Bezier curve, which uses two control points, a quadratic cubic Bezier curve uses a single control point.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個控制點，三次方貝茲曲線不同二次方的三次方貝茲曲線會使用單一的控制點。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上一個區段的結束點，做為起點。

trans-unit.source: If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A> method as its start point.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是在圖中的第一個區段，它會使用指定的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure%2A>方法以做為其起始點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry> cannot be serialized if it contains a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry>如果它包含無法序列化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>或任何非圖案或區段遭拒。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to draw a quadratic Bezier curve using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.QuadraticBezierTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何畫二次方的貝茲曲線使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.QuadraticBezierTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to add a segment without starting a figure by calling the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 未先呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext.BeginFigure(System.Windows.Point,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> 方法以開始圖形，即嘗試新增區段。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。
